description:
This comprehensive video course outlines proven strategies and techniques for Real Estate professionals in the world of online marketing, advertising and lead generation based on creating original content on Youtube.

You'll also learn:

  • How to Optimize Youtube Videos for SEO
  • How to Share Video across multiple Social Media Platforms
  • Script Writing for Hosted Home Tours
  • How to Shoot an Informational Interview
  • The Power of Podcasting
  • How to leverage Pinterest to generate leads and more!

I walk you through, step-by-step, the process I take each time I create a new video and upload it to Youtube. I share everything I do to make my videos optimized for search engines as well as how I share them across multiple platforms for the greatest impact possible. I reveal my ongoing Youtube habits for success plus my off-Youtube strategies.

This easy-to-follow video course shows Realtors how to develop, write and shoot a hosted home video tour, conduct an informational interview and how to best present their Youtube Channel to the public.

I teach Real Estate professionals how to leverage Pinterest, Facebook, Twitter and Youtube to drive traffic to their listings and generate leads.

For Realtors, it's not necessarily about Youtube subscribers. It's about exposure and showcasing who they are and what they have to offer. When you take this course, I'm positive you'll be ready to take your Real Estate career to the next level.

My goal is to help you, Dominate on Youtube!

Dave Erickson
title: Dominate on Youtube for Realtors
